title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 371.1 - Public records
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 371.1 - Public records

State Regulations

The public records of the board, which are required to be
made available under article 6 of the New York Public Officers Law, shall be
available for inspection and copying upon written request, reasonably
describing the record or records sought, during the times provided in this Part
at the board's office at 30 South Pearl Street, 10th Floor, Albany, NY
12207. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
371.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
